text: Anyone know the easiest way to integrate payment into a landing page form? My client is selling tickets to a workshop but wasn't sure if he should do it through a form on a landing page within HubSpot or just link out to eventbrite or some service like that.

<@UF6MG8UH1> Last time I dealt with this Deposit Fix was a pretty great and quick Stripe integration, but since they raised their prices it may be cost prohibitive. Would be worth checking out though.
i have had a good experience with them as well
but i dont pay the bills :sweat_smile:
